string-array.name: Quotes
string-array.item: Rulers of the Vale of Arryn from the castle of the Eyrie.
Former vassals to House Tully, rulers of the Riverlands from the castle of Riverrun after ususrping their positions after the Red Wedding.
There is a tide in the affairs of men, which taken at the flood, leads on to fortune. Omitted, all the voyage of their life is bound in shallows and in miseries.
